title: All for my Friends' Sake! The Darkness Within Robin!
short_summary: The reasons for Nico Robin's actions are shown, as well as a summary of her back story.
long_summary: In the town of Monstown, the Gorgon Rodusa has lost her favorite earrings. To cheer her up, her monster friends Lugyao, Chopaken, Stranami, Saneara, Ussopaka, and Zoromilk try to find her something even nicer!
